from utils.snowflake_connection import SnowflakeHook
print(''Testing Snowflake connection with keep-alive...'')

        print(f''✅ Connection successful! Current time: {result.iloc[0,0]}'')
        print(''✅ Keep-alive parameters applied successfully'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''❌ Connection failed: {e}'')
